trans-unit.source: Specifies whether components in the assembly run in the creator's process or in a system process.
trans-unit.target: 指定在程序集中的组件运行的创建者的进程中或者在系统进程。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationActivationAttribute"></xref> class, setting the specified <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ActivationOption"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationActivationAttribute"></xref>类，设置指定<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ActivationOption"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported in the current version.
trans-unit.target: 当前版本中不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported in the current version.
trans-unit.target: 当前版本中不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing a virtual root on the Web for the COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，表示的 COM + 应用程序 Web 上的虚拟根。

trans-unit.source: When used, all the work required to set up or tear down SOAP for the application occurs.
trans-unit.target: 使用时，将发生设置或关闭 SOAP 应用程序所需的所有工作。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set for an application that is running on a computer on which the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] is not installed, an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置的应用程序在其上的计算机上运行[!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)]未安装，则将会出错。

trans-unit.source: The virtual root on the Web for the COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: 在 COM + 应用程序 Web 上找到虚拟根目录。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ActivationOption"></xref> values, either <xref uid="langword_csharp_Library" name="Library" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ActivationOption"></xref> values, either <xref uid="langword_csharp_Library" name="Library" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""></xref>.
